text: If you are using the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/connected-email/how-to-install-HubSpot-sales|HubSpot Sales Extension>, it may look a bit different on your end with Outlook but you can adjust the settings (this screenshot is from Gmail) so it tracks and logs ALL emails by default, and you can even go so far to track new contacts as well. Hope this is somewhat of a helpful answer!
